author: Special Correspondent
text: A new bus service between Sivakasi and Bengaluru was flagged off by Minister for Information K. T. Rajendra Balaji at Sivakasi on Monday. The bus will leave Sivakasi at 7.30 p.m. and reach Bengaluru at 6 a.m. It will be operated to the same timings in the reverse direction.
title: New bus service
